ing.item: Velveeta Mexican pasteurized process cheese spread with Jalapeno pepper; sliced

directions.step:
Combine avocado, eggs, bacon and mayonnaise; mix lightly. For each sandwich, cover one bread slice with Velveeta Mexican cheese spread, approximately 1/4 cup avocado mixture and second bread slice. Spread sandwich with margarine. Grill until lightly browned on both sides. 4 sandwiches.
From a collection of my mother's (Judy Hosey) recipe box which contained lots of her favorite recipes, clippings, etc. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
